name: Crimson_Jack
content:
Crimson Jack was a human male pirate who, during the First Order-Resistance War, attempted to claim a bounty from the First Order after discovering that someone onboard the Purgill-class starcruiser Halcyon had sent a transmission to the Resistance. While threatening Captain Riyola Keevan over a hologram transmission, Jack stated that the First Order would pay him well to turn over the individual responsible.
Crimson Jack made his first canon appearance in the first issue of the comic book miniseries Star Wars: Halcyon Legacy, which was written by Ethan Sacks, illustrated by Will Sliney, and published by Marvel Comics on February 2, 2022. In the Star Wars Legends continuity, Crimson Jack debuted in the seventh issue of the original Marvel Star Wars comic series, written by Roy Thomas and Howard Chaykin, illustrated by Chaykin, and published by Marvel on October 11, 1977.
